languages.text: {n}Не успевает затихнуть гром от вашего выстрела, а Соломон уже жмет на спусковой крючок и безошибочно поражает стеклянную мишень.{/n}
{n}Before the thunder of your shot subsides, Solomorne is already pulling the trigger and hitting the glass target with ease.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Не успевает затихнуть гром от вашего выстрела, а Соломон уже жмет на спусковой крючок и безошибочно поражает стеклянную мишень.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの銃声の轟きが消える前に、ソロモーンはすでに引き金を引き、ガラスの的を難なく撃ち抜いていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before the thunder of your shot subsides, Solomorne is already pulling the trigger and hitting the glass target with ease.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Daha atışının gürültüsü dinmeden Solomorne'un çoktan tetiği çektiğini ve cam hedefi kolaylıkla vurduğunu görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before the thunder of your shot subsides, Solomorne is already pulling the trigger and hitting the glass target with ease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Daha atışının gürültüsü dinmeden Solomorne'un çoktan tetiği çektiğini ve cam hedefi kolaylıkla vurduğunu görüyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Antes de que se apague el trueno de tu disparo, Solomorne pulsa el gatillo, destrozando sin esfuerzo aparente la diana de vidrio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before the thunder of your shot subsides, Solomorne is already pulling the trigger and hitting the glass target with ease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Antes de que se apague el trueno de tu disparo, Solomorne pulsa el gatillo, destrozando sin esfuerzo aparente la diana de vidrio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}枪声还没完全消散，索罗蒙就扣动了扳机，轻而易举地击碎了玻璃瓶。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before the thunder of your shot subsides, Solomorne is already pulling the trigger and hitting the glass target with ease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}枪声还没完全消散，索罗蒙就扣动了扳机，轻而易举地击碎了玻璃瓶。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Avant même que le tonnerre de votre tir se dissipe, Solomorne appuie sur la gâchette et touche la bouteille avec une aisance déconcertante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before the thunder of your shot subsides, Solomorne is already pulling the trigger and hitting the glass target with ease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avant même que le tonnerre de votre tir se dissipe, Solomorne appuie sur la gâchette et touche la bouteille avec une aisance déconcertante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Schuss ist noch nicht verhallt, als Solomorne abdrückt und das gläserne Ziel mühelos trifft.{/n}
